footer.brandDescription: Professional beauty education and luxury salon services — built on passion, skill, and creativity.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Sparkle in Style. All rights reserved.

hero.breadcrumb: The Hague • Beauty Academy & Beauty Salon
hero.description: Work in a real salon environment with clients, colours, and trends. Sparkle in Style combines a professional Beauty Academy with a modern Beauty Salon — giving you hands-on experience from day one.

highlights.teacherDesc: Trainers with years of real salon experience.
highlights.practicalDesc: Small groups, real models, and client sessions.
highlights.flexibleDesc: Begin at several times throughout the year.

makeup.title: Make-up & Beauty Styling
makeup.desc: From essential techniques to editorial looks, including a professional portfolio day.

hair.title: Hair & Styling
hair.desc: Cutting, blow-drying, and updos, plus salon etiquette and client consultation.

nails.title: Nail Styling
nails.desc: Gel polish, acrylics, and nail care with complete hygiene protocol training.

lash.title: Lash & Brow Styling
lash.desc: Brow shaping, tinting, lamination, and lash lifting to create long-lasting, defined looks.

fashion.title: Fashion Styling
fashion.desc: Wardrobe curation, color theory, and styling for shoots, events, and personal branding.

business.title: Beauty Business & Entrepreneurship
business.desc: Build your own brand: pricing, client communication, social media, and beauty business basics.

signature.title: Signature Cut & Style
signature.desc: Precision cutting tailored to your face shape with a luxury blowout.

balayage.title: Balayage & Gloss
balayage.desc: Hand-painted highlights for a natural, sun-kissed dimension.

manicure.title: Gel Couture Manicure
manicure.desc: Detailed cuticle care, shaping, and long-lasting gel polish.

pedicure.title: Luxury Pedicure
pedicure.desc: Exfoliating scrub, mask, hot stone massage, and polish.

event.title: Event Makeup
event.desc: Long-wearing HD makeup for special occasions.

bridal.title: Bridal Package
bridal.desc: Trial session plus wedding day application.

brochure.title: Full Salon Menu
brochure.subtitle: Transparent pricing. Tailored experience.
brochure.intro: Each treatment is personalized during consultation. If you’re not sure which option fits you, choose the category and we’ll guide you.
brochure.note: Prices may vary based on consultation, hair length, and requested finish.
brochure.footerText: Ready to book? We’ll confirm the exact option during consultation.

cuts.name: Cuts
cuts.desc: Trim, model cut, kids, wash + cut + dry

reviews.quote: Thanks to Sparkle in Style, I now have a job in a top salon. Super practical and you build a portfolio immediately.
reviews.author: Sara

reviews.quote: Small groups and genuinely personal feedback. I felt seen and improved with every single lesson.
reviews.author: Esra

reviews.quote: Hygiene, technique, and pace — exactly what you need in real practice. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Lotte

paragraph1.suffix: Sparkle in Style is a certified learning company that provides high-quality, vocational training and social coaching for young people and adults. We offer people from vulnerable groups the opportunity to learn a profession in personal care and beauty. Students develop employability skills and work on their personal growth, and we also provide support as a safety net for secondary-school drop-outs. Alongside learning the profession, students receive intensive one-to-one guidance to build work skills, become more confident and self-reliant, and take steps towards participation in the labour market and society.

about.spaceText: calm, professional, and designed for both education and client experience.

contact.description: Visit us, call us, or send a message — we’re happy to help with academy programs or salon appointments.
